cache_key._comment: This block contains elements which are used to do cache lookup.

request_data._comment1: This section is optional, intended mostly for frontend debugging
request_data._comment2: The filters will be converted to a checksum for cache lookup

filters._comment: The filter selections use the unique DB identifier of each option

metadata._comment: This block is used to determine the age of the data

response_data._comment: Price is given with currency code for future proofing
